overview: Amy starts to take the future of the company into her own hands by coming up with an innovative revenue generating ideas. Her plans of bringing Denise down are slowly coming together with the help of her loyal co-workers. Jill is ready to do anything for Amy, the love of her life, but Amy is only interested in sleeping with anyone who will help her regain control of the company. Dana the company lawyer will now joy forces with Amy.
title: Babes Illustrated: Burning Desire
